displayProperties.name: Hot Swap
displayProperties.description:
Switching to this weapon while you are damaged strongly increases its handling for a short duration.

Swords gain increased charge speed, guard resistance, and guard endurance instead.

displayProperties.name: Deprecated Perk
displayProperties.description: This perk has been deprecated and no longer functions.

displayProperties.name: Solar Weapon Surge
displayProperties.description: Your Solar weapons gain a small bonus to damage while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

displayProperties.name: Recovery-Forged
displayProperties.description: +3 Recovery

displayProperties.name: Fastball
displayProperties.description: Increases grenade throw distance.

displayProperties.name: Unflinching Solar Aim
displayProperties.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming a Solar weapon.

displayProperties.name: Submachine Gun Loader
displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed of Submachine Guns.

displayProperties.name: Explosive Payload
displayProperties.description: Projectiles create an area-of-effect detonation on impact. Improves reload.

displayProperties.name: Void Damage Resistance
displayProperties.description: Reduces incoming Void damage from combatants.

displayProperties.name: Solar Damage Resistance
displayProperties.description: Reduces incoming Solar damage from combatants.

displayProperties.name: Deprecated Perk
displayProperties.description: This perk has been deprecated and no longer functions.

displayProperties.name: Mechanized Autoloader
displayProperties.description: This weapon automatically reloads on ammo pickup.

displayProperties.name: Heavy Hunter Armor
displayProperties.description: Improved resilience.

displayProperties.name: Deprecated Perk
displayProperties.description: This perk has been deprecated and no longer functions.

displayProperties.name: Light Reactor
displayProperties.description: Gain bonus Super energy on Fusion Rifle kills.

displayProperties.name: Paracausal Pellets
displayProperties.description: Landing nearly all Stasis pellets will freeze targets; landing nearly all Solar pellets will ignite targets.

displayProperties.name: Perpetual Motion
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion.

displayProperties.name: Crucible Pink
displayProperties.description: Adds a pink Crucible crest to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Mobius Conduit
displayProperties.description: Allows for early deactivation of an Arc Staff.

displayProperties.name: Snapshot Sights
displayProperties.description: Faster time to aim down sights. Stability is increased.

displayProperties.name: Fury Conductors
displayProperties.description: Melee hits store explosive defensive energy.

displayProperties.name: Horns of Doom
displayProperties.description: Void melee kills give Super energy. Improves Sentinel Shield.

displayProperties.name: Biotic Enhancements
displayProperties.description: Buffs melee range. Being surrounded buffs damage.

displayProperties.name: Deprecated Perk
displayProperties.description: Deprecated Perk

displayProperties.name: All-Seeing Eye
displayProperties.description: Detect resources within a 30-meter range while on destinations with a linked obelisk.

displayProperties.name: Rocket Launcher Loader
displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed of Rocket Launchers.

displayProperties.name: Iron Grip
displayProperties.description: Massively improves weapon stability at the cost of reload speed.

displayProperties.name: Major Resist
displayProperties.description: Gain extra damage resistance against powerful combatants.

displayProperties.name: Small Offerings
displayProperties.description: Unlocks an additional weekly bounty for Hawthorne.

displayProperties.name: Scout Rifle Holster
displayProperties.description: Gradually reloads your stowed Scout Rifles over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

displayProperties.name: Adept Reload
displayProperties.description: +10 Reload

displayProperties.name: Enhanced Auto Rifle Loader
displayProperties.description: Greatly increases reload speed of Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Enhanced Pulse Rifle Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Greatly increases ready and stow speed for Pulse Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Psychohack
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Nessus Scout Reports
displayProperties.description: A member of your fireteam has used a Scout Report, which highlights nearby loot catches on Nessus for all members of the fireteam.

displayProperties.name: Chimera
displayProperties.description: After this weapon fires, equipped Kinetic and Power weapons gain a brief period of increased handling and accuracy.

displayProperties.name: Thar Be Treasure!
displayProperties.description: Adds a treasure chest appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Discipline
displayProperties.description: Spark of Discipline

displayProperties.name: Swift Charge
displayProperties.description: Become Charged with Light by rapidly defeating combatants with Pulse Rifles, Sidearms, or Submachine Guns.

displayProperties.name: Sidearm Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases your chance of finding Special ammo while you have a Sidearm equipped that uses Special ammo.

displayProperties.name: Enhanced Unflinching Auto Rifle Aim
displayProperties.description: Greatly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Arc Aligned—Rank 4
displayProperties.description: By aligning with the Festival Flame, you do tons of damage with Arc power.

displayProperties.name: Arc Aligned—Rank 5
displayProperties.description: By aligning with the Festival Flame, you do a ludicrous amount of damage with Arc power.

displayProperties.name: Arc Aligned—Rank 1
displayProperties.description: By aligning with the Festival Flame, you do more damage with Arc power.

displayProperties.name: Arc Aligned—Rank 2
displayProperties.description: By aligning with the Festival Flame, you do a lot more damage with Arc power.

displayProperties.name: Arc Aligned—Rank 3
displayProperties.description: By aligning with the Festival Flame, you do significantly more damage with Arc power.

displayProperties.name: Heating Up
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil for a longer duration.

displayProperties.name: Font of Endurance
displayProperties.description: You gain a bonus to resilience while you have any Armor Charge. Your Armor Charge now decays over time.

displayProperties.name: Reef Shimmer
displayProperties.description: Adds an Awoken pointillistic appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Reef Oracle
displayProperties.description: Adds an Awoken circle appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Corrupt Ether
displayProperties.description: Adds a corrupted Ether appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Reef Awoken
displayProperties.description: Adds an Awoken teleportation appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Deprecated Perk
displayProperties.description: This perk has been deprecated and no longer functions.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Hand Cannon
displayProperties.description: Aiming down sights loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against  [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Unplanned Reprieve
displayProperties.description: Projectiles attach and detonate.

displayProperties.name: Bow Targeting
displayProperties.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Bows.

displayProperties.name: Shatter Shot
displayProperties.description: This weapon's uncharged projectiles deal bonus damage to Stasis crystals and frozen targets. Rapidly destroying multiple Stasis crystals reloads this weapon from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Dragonfly
displayProperties.description: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Persistence
displayProperties.description: Void buffs applied to you (Invisibility, Overshield, and Devour) have increased duration.

displayProperties.name: Backup Plan
displayProperties.description: Grants reduced charge time and increased handling speed for a short time immediately after swapping to this weapon.

displayProperties.name: Aggressive Frame
displayProperties.description: High damage, moderate charge time. Fires a horizontal volley.

displayProperties.name: Stat Increase
displayProperties.description: +10 Resilience ▲

displayProperties.name: Stacks on Stacks
displayProperties.description: Gain an extra stack of Charged with Light for every stack you gain.

displayProperties.name: Precisely Charged
displayProperties.description: Become Charged with Light by getting multiple rapid precision final blows with Linear Fusion Rifles or Sniper Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Extra Reserves
displayProperties.description: While Charged with Light, defeating combatants with Void damage grants a chance to drop Special ammo. This effect consumes all stacks of Charged with Light. The more stacks you have, the higher your chance of gaining the ammo drop.

displayProperties.name: Protective Light
displayProperties.description: While Charged with Light, you gain significant damage resistance against combatants when your shields are destroyed. This effect consumes all stacks of Charged with Light. The more stacks consumed, the longer the damage resistance lasts.

displayProperties.name: Green Beam
displayProperties.description: Adds a green beam to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: The Game is Afoot!
displayProperties.description: Follow the clue trail and see where it leads.

displayProperties.name: Stat Penalty
displayProperties.description: -20 Mobility ▼

displayProperties.name: Spark of Beacons
displayProperties.description: While you are amplified, your Arc Special weapon final blows create a blinding explosion.

displayProperties.name: Steady Hands
displayProperties.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Silver Contender's Boon
displayProperties.description:
This buff commemorates your Silver Tier score in the Guardian Games: Training or Competitive modes.

Defeating combatants with abilities grants increased weapon damage, while defeating combatants with weapons grants increased ability recharge speed.

Empowerment stacks 3 times.

While at maximum empowerment, defeat combatants to gain a boost to mobility.

This is active only in Guardian Games playlist activities and will expire on weekly reset.

displayProperties.name: Minor Mobility Mod
displayProperties.description: Grants increased mobility.

displayProperties.name: BrayTech Signal
displayProperties.description: This signal will draw out House Salvation techno squads hunting for Golden Age tech in the Europa Eclipsed Zone.

displayProperties.name: Aggressive Glaive
displayProperties.description: [Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield
